props.name: id
props.description: Id of the DataObject

props.name: viewName
props.description: Viewname from which to select

props.name: appId
props.description: App id to which this DataObject belongs to

props.name: uniqueTable
props.description: Table used for inserting, updating and deleting records.

props.name: expandView
props.description: When true will add context filtering in the backend

props.name: deleteConfirm
props.description: Show confirmation prompt before deleting a row.

props.name: allowInsert
props.description: Allow inserting rows from this DataObject.

props.name: allowUpdate
props.description: Allow updating rows from this DataObject.

props.name: allowDelete
props.description: Allow deleting rows from this DataObject.

props.name: createNewAtTheEnd
props.description: Push new records instead of unshifting them.

props.name: clientSideFiltering
props.description: Use already retrieved data when filtering instead of fetching from database

props.name: disableSaveOncurrentIndexChange
props.description: Skip saving tries when current index is changed.

props.name: selectFirstRowOnLoad
props.description: Selects first row on load

props.name: fields
props.description: List of select fields used by this DataObject.

props.name: viewDefinition
props.description: View definition object used to set up DataObject.Fields.

props.name: uniqueTableDefinition
props.description: Unique table definition oobject used to set up DataObject.Fields.

props.name: disableLayouts
props.description: Disable layout module.

props.name: filterString
props.description: Initial filter string.

props.name: filterObject
props.description: Filter Object.

props.name: whereClause
props.description: Initial where clause.

props.name: distinctRows
props.description: Select distinct rows.

props.name: maxRecords
props.description: Max records used in retrieve requests.

props.name: loadRecents
props.description: Load recents for lookups. Default is false here, but it can be enabled by the lookup component itself.

props.name: dynamicLoading
props.description: Use dynamic loading (legacy paging | virtual list paging ). Default is false, but it can be enabled by the grid component.

props.name: optimisticLocking
props.description: Don't allow updates if Updated value is diffrent from currently loaded one

props.name: dataHandler
props.description: Optional custom DataHandler class, must implement IDataHandler interface.

props.name: masterDataObject_ID
props.description: Id of the master DataObject if this DataObject has MasterDetails defined

props.name: masterDetailDefinition
props.description: MasterDetails bindings

props.name: disableAutoLoad
props.description: Don't auto load this details object when master index changes

props.name: enableProperties
props.description: When set to true will check fop properties configuration in the database and attempt to initialize properties data extension

props.name: disableSaveOnBeforeLoad
props.description: When true will stop attempting to save changes when load is called

props.name: localizeFields
props.description: To call localize fields prop. Used for translating Headers

components.name: confirm
components.description: Function that prompts the user with a confirm dialog

snippets.title: Example
snippets.code: {COMPONENT}({ title: 'Confirm title', message: 'Confirm message to display' }).then(() => { // Handle action confirmed }).catch(() => { // Handle confirm rejected });

props.name: dataObject
props.description: The data object used in the grid

props.name: columns
props.description: Columns passed as an array instead of slots

props.name: rowClass
props.description: String, dynamic class object or function that will be bound to the row class property. The current row is provided to the function as an argument.

props.name: rowStyle
props.description: String, dynamic class object or function that will be bound to the row class property. The current row is provided to the function as an argument.

props.name: menuTabs
props.description: An array of custom tab definitions for the grid sidemenu details tab.

props.name: rowclickhandler
props.description: Override the row click handler, when provided will not set current index

props.name: noHeader
props.description: When set to `true` will not render header.

props.name: noHeaderRow
props.description: When set to `true` will not render header row, but will still render the header container.

props.name: noFooter
props.description: When set to `true` will not render footer.

props.name: disableFilterRow
props.description: When set to `true` will not render filter row.

props.name: detailIframe
props.description: Path for detail iframe

props.name: detailTabTitle
props.description: The label used on the detail iframe tab

props.name: multilineHeader
props.description: Enables word wrapping for header columns

props.name: importData
props.description: When true, will show importData

props.name: initialMenuWidth
props.description: Sets the initial width of the grid menu, accepts values either in 'px' or '%'

props.name: groupByFolders
props.description: Adds group by folders selector into right panel

props.name: dynamicLoading
props.description: Enables dynamic loading for the grid. When set to false will set the inner height to loaded data length.

props.name: disableNavigation
props.description: When set to `true` will disable grid navigation features.

props.name: collapseGridMenu
props.description: When set to `true` the grid setup menu will be initially collapsed.

props.name: newRecordsPosition
props.description: Position where new records are rendered.

props.name: disableSelectAll
props.description: When set to `true` the select all checkbox will not render

props.name: hideGridMenu
props.description: When set to `true` will not render the grid setup menu.

props.name: fieldFilters
props.description: An array of initial field filters. For example `['Title', {name:'StatusCode', distinct:'StatusCode'}]`

props.name: disableDeleteConfirm
props.description: When true will disable confirm dialog on delete actions in grid.

props.name: noRowsFound
props.description: Then set to true, will show default message and enable for custom overriding via 'noRowsFound' slot. Can also be used to override default message.

props.name: eagerGridControl
props.description: Returns grid control ref immediately after creation

props.name: onDemandFields
props.description: Select list will contain only visible grid columns and sort order columns set on data object

props.name: loadDataObject
props.description: When set to true the grid will load the dataobject after mount

props.name: softDelete
props.description: Use soft delete for ActionDelete in grid

props.name: autoFilterDebounce
props.description: If provided will filter automaticly when typing in filter cells with the debounce value.

props.name: noGroupByContainer
props.description: Will disable the group by container, used when you don't want to allow the user to change group by settings

props.name: groupColumnDefinition
props.description: The column definition used when grouping is enabled for the Group column

props.name: treeColumnDefinition
props.description: The column definition used to render TreeColumn when treeify is enabled on the provided dataobject

props.name: itemsToRender
props.description: Initial number of items to render for visual scroll.

props.name: createNewOverrideFn
props.description: Function for creating new

props.name: hideSystemColumn
props.description: When set to true will not render system column (current row indicator)

props.name: disableSorting
props.description: When set to true will disable sorting

props.name: activeRows
props.description: When set to false will not stylize active (current) row

props.name: disableBatchRecords
props.description: When set to true will disable the new record button and new records container

props.name: hideActionColumn
props.description: When set to true will not render action column

props.name: hideMultiselectColumn
props.description: When set to true will not render multi-select column

props.name: hideNewRecords
props.description: When set to true will skip rendering of the new record rows

props.name: detailMessageChannelId
props.description: Optional id to enable the message channel on the detail iframe

props.name: detailMessageChannelFunctions
props.description: Map of functions callable by the iframe message channel

slots.name: detailTab
slots.description: Alternative to rendering detail Iframe

props.name: colId
props.description: ptional unique id used for unbound columns.

props.name: field
props.description: Field from Data Object

props.name: width
props.description: width of column

props.name: minWidth
props.description: minimum width of column

props.name: flexwidth
props.description: A percentage of the unused width that should be added to this column. If provided, should be a value between 1 = 100

props.name: editable
props.description: Enabled editing

props.name: sortable
props.description: Enabled sorting

props.name: menu
props.description: disabled menu on this column

props.name: hide
props.description: hides column from view. Can still be selected from Column Chooser

props.name: format
props.description: Format used by default editors and when rendering values.

props.name: filter
props.description: Can be used to provide custom filter component.

props.name: filterField
props.description: Optional field to use for filtering instead of the main 'field' of column

props.name: cellrenderer
props.description: Optional cell renderer component definition or registered component name. When provided overrides #default slot

props.name: celleditor
props.description: Optional cell renderer component definition or registered component name. When provided overrides #editor slot

props.name: cellrendererparams
props.description: Additional props object that will be provided to the cell renderer component

props.name: cellTitle
props.description: Cell tooltip function. Should be a function that takes in a row and returns a string

props.name: cellStyle
props.description: Cell style. Can either be a static one for all cells or a per row function

props.name: disableDistinct
props.description: disabled distinct filter for this column's field

props.name: suppressSelection
props.description: Disable drag selection for this column

props.name: bulkUpdate
props.description: Enable bulk update for this column

props.name: singleClickEdit
props.description: Enter edit mode after a single click on this column

props.name: utc
props.description: When enabled will force UTC mode for datepickers and formatted date renderers

props.name: getCopyValue
props.description: Function called when copying values that takes in a row and returns the value for copying.

props.name: disableResize
props.description: disables resizing of this column.

props.name: class
props.description: Class for all cells in this column.

props.name: required
props.description: sets column/field as required when editing

props.name: sortField
props.description: Field to sort on

props.name: groupAggregate
props.description: Aggregate column

props.name: disableGrouping
props.description: Do not allow grouping of this column

props.name: colspan
props.description: Span of this column

slots.name: editor
slots.description: The cell editor slot to be used when in edit mode

slots.name: bulkupdateeditor
slots.description: The bulk update editor slot

slots.name: headertext
slots.description: Replaces label text contet of the header cell with this slot

slots.name: headerMenu
slots.description: Add custom menu items to the header menu for this column

slots.name: summary
slots.description: The cell summary slot to be used for rendering summary values

slots.name: contextmenuTop
slots.description: Custom context menu items rendered at the top

slots.name: contextmenuBottom
slots.description: Custom context menu items rendered at the bottom

slots.name: overlay
slots.description: Overlay over the entire column

props.name: field
props.description: Field from Data Object

props.name: width
props.description: width of column

props.name: minWidth
props.description: minimum width of column

props.name: flexwidth
props.description: A percentage of the unused width that should be added to this column. If provided, should be a value between 1 = 100

props.name: filter
props.description: Can be used to provide custom filter component.

props.name: cellTitle
props.description: Cell tooltip function. Should be a function that takes in a row and returns a string

props.name: cellStyle
props.description: Cell style. Can either be a static one for all cells or a per row function

props.name: getCopyValue
props.description: Function called when copying values that takes in a row and returns the value for copying.

props.name: filterField
props.description: Optional field to use for filter instead of the main 'field' of column

props.name: sortField
props.description: Optional field to use for sorting instead of the main 'field' of column

props.name: sortable
props.description: Enabled sorting

props.name: disableResize
props.description: disables resizing of this column.

props.name: showPrefix
props.description: When true the default renderer will display column captions for group by configurations

props.name: hideCount
props.description: When true the default rednerer will not display detail counts

props.name: groupBy
props.description: Enable group by mode in grid

props.name: cellrendererparams
props.description: Additional props object that will be provided to the cell renderer component

props.name: loadFullStructure
props.description: Enable client side node structure

props.name: userAggregates
props.description: Enable user defined aggregates

props.name: onlyShowOnGroupBy
props.description: When enabled this column will only be visible in grid when there is active group by

snippets.title: Example
snippets.code: <NodeColumn colId="Group" groupBy boldDisplay onlyShowOnGroupBy pinned="left" userAggregates />

components.name: DataLookup
components.description: Lookup component. Takes {COMPONENT=5} component as children.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables lookup.

props.name: whereClause
props.description: Set custom whereclause on dataobject in Lookup. Can be used to create bound whereclauses.

props.name: reloadOnWhereClauseChange
props.description: For when you need the lookup to reload on any where clause change.

props.name: itemLoaded
props.description: For use in multiselect.

props.name: currentRow
props.description: For setting currentRow on mobile.

props.name: title
props.description: Tooltip title for lookup on desktop. Will be used as header for lookup on mobile.

props.name: noSearch
props.description: Disables search

props.name: focusField
props.description: By default the desktop lookup will autofocus first visible column filter field. Use this prop to specify other field.

slots.name: target
slots.description: To use custom target instead of <input> you can pass #target slot. Scope object {target, open} is passed to this slot. By default a click listener is attached to the target that opens the lookup. This can be turned off with suppressClickEvent property on <ODataLookup>

components.name: ButtonGroup
components.description: Button Group is often used in combination with DataGrid

props.name: onClickShowHidden
props.description: Fires when "Show Hidden" btn is clicked and displayShowHidden prop is active

props.name: displayCommonTasks
props.description: Displays "Common Tasks" dropdown. Usually functionality like "Create new" go in here.

props.name: displayReports
props.description: Displays "Reports" dropdown. Reports for your application go usually in here. Enables for #reports slot

props.name: displayFilters
props.description: For grid filters, like "Include Inactive". Enables for #filters slot.

props.name: displayShowHidden
props.description: Adds buttons to show hidden

props.name: smallButtons
props.description: When true displays smaller buttons instead

props.name: reportsAutoClose
props.description: Auto closed reports.

props.name: tasksAutoClose
props.description: Auto closes taks

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Adds buttons to the front of the buttongroup

slots.name: commonTasks
slots.description: Items will be added in "Common Tasks" dropdown.

slots.name: filters
slots.description: Items will be added into "Filters" dropdown. displayFilter prop must be true to show this slot.

slots.name: reports
slots.description: Items will be added into "Reports" dropdown. displayReports prop is required for this to show.

slots.name: append
slots.description: Add items to the end of the button group

props.name: to
props.description: HTML Tag where modal should be rendered.

props.name: class
props.description: HTML Classes

props.name: disableTeleport
props.description: Disabled teleport and renders modal directly where it is located inside your HTML code.

props.name: alwaysRender
props.description: Will always render modal. If false it will render when modal opens.

events.name: shown
events.description: The event is emitted when the modal is shown and the css transactions have finished

events.name: show
events.description: The event is emitted when modal is transitioning to show

events.name: hidden
events.description: The event is emitted when the modal is hidden and the css transactions have finished

events.name: hide
events.description: The event is emitted when the modal is hidden and the css transactions have finished

props.name: title
props.description: Title shown over input

props.name: for
props.description: ID of input field referencing to this label.

props.name: helpText
props.description: Helper text for clarifying a input field.

props.name: inline
props.description: Will display label and input next to each other.

props.name: inlineClasses
props.description: classes for inline group.

props.name: :bind
props.description: Used to bind seleted values to your variables

props.name: :bind
props.description: Used to bind seleted values to your variables

props.description: Used to bind seleted values to your variables

props.description: Used to bind seleted values to your variables

props.name: OnlyShowPersonnelLocations
props.description: Will only show locations that Personnel can be placed in

props.name: includeAllPersons
props.description: Includes all persons, even external persons

props.name: includeInactivePersons
props.description: Includes inactive persons

props.name: showAsButton
props.description: Will render button instead of input

props.name: buttonIconClassName
props.description: Icon class names. Required prop: showAsButton

props.name: buttonClassName
props.description: Class names for button. Required prop: showAsButton

props.name: Company_ID
props.description: Filters on Company ID

props.name: includeCompanyInfo
props.description: Includes company info

props.name: :bind
props.description: Used to bind seleted values to your variables

props.name: Project_ID
props.description: Filter on Project_ID (If you specify this dont specify Domain_ID)

props.name: Domain_ID
props.description: Filter on Domain_ID (Same as above)

props.name: hideCompleted
props.description: Hide completed subprojects (SubProjects with CompletedFinalAccount = 0)

props.name: showAsButton
props.description: Will render button instead of input

props.name: focusInput
props.description: Will focus input

props.name: buttonIconClassName
props.description: Icon class names. Required prop: showAsButton

props.name: buttonClassName
props.description: Class names for button. Required prop: showAsButton

props.name: disableContextFilter
props.description: Causes enableContextFilter to never be enabled

props.name: disableInputMask
props.description: Disables masking for the InputMask component, fallback to normal input

props.name: IncludeCompletedFinalAccount
props.description: Includes Completed Final Accounts

events.name: maskCompleted
events.description: Emits matching row on SubProjectNo when mask is completed from manually typing SubProjectNo.

snippets.title: Example
snippets.content: For use outside of grid. Remove class when using inside DataGrid

props.name: title
props.description: Text to the left of input

props.name: icon
props.description: Bootstrap icon class

props.name: append
props.description: Include this prop if you want to append add-on instead of prepend

props.name: validate
props.description: Adds validation support.

props.name: invalidFeedback
props.description: Message that is displayed if input fails validation

snippets.title: Example

props.name: enableUrlFilter
props.description: Enables for URL filtering

exposes.name: setActiveTab
exposes.description: Lets you set the active tab by passing the id of the tab you want to switch to. In such case you need to add ids on the <{COMPONENT=42}> components.

props.name: id
props.description: Will be used as id for the tab-content element

props.name: title
props.description: Title of tab

props.name: tabIndex
props.description: Index of tab

props.name: active
props.description: Sets initially active tab.

props.name: linkClass
props.description: Classes for tablink

props.name: linkStyle
props.description: Sets the style of the tab link

props.name: paneClass
props.description: Classes for pane

props.name: paneStyle
props.description: Sets the style of the pane

props.name: itemClass
props.description: Classes for item

props.name: itemStyle
props.description: Sets the style of the item

props.name: tabHeight
props.description: Height of tab

props.name: alwaysRender
props.description: Will always render tab

slots.name: default
slots.description: Panel content for this tab.

slots.name: title
slots.description: Title of tab

props.name: useEvents
props.description: Enable EventEmitter on the Sizer control for Resized and Resizing events

props.name: initiallyCollapsed
props.description: Set the panel as collapsed initially (must have collapse prop)

props.name: initiallyExpanded
props.description: Set the panel as expanded initially (must have expand prop)

props.name: minWidth
props.description: Sets the min width of the sizer panel. Value can be either in pixels or percentage. Ex: "600px" or "20%"

props.name: minHeight
props.description: Sets the min height of the sizer panel. Value can be either in pixels or percentage. Ex: "600px" or "20%"

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Sets the max width of the sizer panel. Value can be either in pixels or percentage. Ex: "600px" or "20%"

props.name: maxHeight
props.description: Sets the max height of the sizer panel. Value can be either in pixels or percentage. Ex: "600px" or "20%"

props.name: collapseAt
props.description: Auto collapse when viewport is smaller than this value

components.name: CardView
components.description: Mobile alternative to grid. Uses Card component

props.name: cardGap
props.description: gap between cards

props.name: noSearch
props.description: Disables search

props.name: useSearchColumn
props.description: Used search column for searching

props.name: searchMaskPlaceholder
props.description: Placeholder for search field

props.name: rowClass
props.description: Passes current row as parameter. return string

slots.name: customSearchControls
slots.description: Custom controls for Search

slots.name: actions
slots.description: Rendered in header

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Card Footer

events.name: onCreateNew
events.description: Fires when new row is created

props.name: noEdit
props.description: Same as readonly

props.name: timepicker
props.description: Toggles timepicker

props.name: timepickerOnly
props.description: Shows only timepicker

props.name: autoSuggestion
props.description: suggests date?

props.name: teleport
props.description: Throws an ender pearl. Just kidding. When true datepicker will be rendered inside input element.

props.name: containerClass
props.description: Classes for Input field

props.name: range
props.description: Enables for 'from'/'to' date selection

props.name: utc
props.description: Toggles UTC date

props.name: query
props.description: Media query string to match against.

events.name: change
events.description: Emitted when the media query status changes

props.name: dataObject
props.description: Data Object belonging to the form

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Add items before the buttons

slots.name: default
slots.description: Add items after the buttons
